name: chinese chop suey
instructions: brown ground meat and onion in a large pot, add 1 / 4 cup of soy sauce, thinly slice the entire bunch of celery , including the leaves, add beef broth and celery, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer until celery is tender, add more soy sauce if needed , to taste, serve as an open face sandwich over a hamburger bun
ingredients: celery, onion, ground pork, soy sauce, beef broth, cooking oil, hamburger buns
